short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Karoo Route Grab - send routes to your Hammerhead Karoo from Strava, Ride with GPS, Komoot, etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To import routes from a variety of sources, view a route in that source and then click the Route Grab icon to import that route to your Hammerhead Karoo dashboard account.
